mention.text: a zero-day Internet Explorer vulnerability that has opened the door for hackers to install malware on susceptible computers without any user intervention
the result of a fundamental flaw in the browser 's data binding function , which ultimately leaves a hole in the memory space that can be accessed by remote hackers
an infected network of compromised computers
people trying to take advantage of this
